Values.3: Uninteresting—the press likely won't report on it
Values.4: Minimum—sparse reporting buried in the papers
Values.5: Medium—makes daily news, but quickly forgotten

Values.11: A body falls out of a closet when opened
Values.12: A corpse turns up in a nearby body of water
Values.13: A diplomat's mistresses all show up at once
Values.14: A pair of twins try to distinguish themselves
Values.15: A politician is found strung up by the neck (`/matrix character politician`)
Values.16: A strangler stalks the less social guests

Values.22: Actually a front for corporate advertising (`/matrix faction corporation`)

Values.26: An attendee gets belligerent upon losing a game

Values.32: Car crash just outside the event

Values.35: Coke done off of a salacious body part

Values.42: Event goers slowly replaced with body snatchers
Values.44: Floor or ceiling collapse, several injured

Values.52: Inexplicable tickling incident between two guests

Values.54: Single hitman methodically cleaning the place out
